ns0:entry.ns0:title: Band & Tone Jamming Analysis and Detection on LoRa signals
ns0:entry.ns0:summary: This paper examines the effect of Band Jamming (BJ) and Tone Jamming (TJ) on LoRa signals in a flat Additive White Gaussian Noise (AWGN) channel. In this scenario, LoRa proves to have good resiliency against these jamming attacks. Furthermore, a simple and lightweight BJ and TJ jammer detection scheme is derived. Theoretical and simulation results show good detection capability, especially with Single Tone Jamming (STJ).
